snippet: The senator’s run was a cycle of hopes and disappointments as Republican voters were ultimately unwilling to entrust him with high office.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio of Florida suspends his presidential campaign after placing distant second in his home state's Republican primary; campaign was riven with miscalculations and disappointments.

byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and MICHAEL BARBARO
byline.contributor: Jeremy W. Peters reported from Miami, and Michael Barbaro from New York.

lead_paragraph: The senator’s run was a cycle of hopes and disappointments as Republican voters were ultimately unwilling to entrust him with high office.

headline.main: A Distant Second at Home, Marco Rubio Ends a Disappointing Campaign
headline.print_headline: A Distant Second at Home, Rubio Ends a Disappointing Campaign
